testcase.name: Successful end-to-end booking - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I open the VietJet Air website for FlightSearch.......................passed When I select origin "SGN" and destination "BMV"............................passed And I select departure day "21" and return day "25".........................passed And I click search flights..................................................passed Then I should see flight options displayed..................................passed And I select a departure flight and continue................................passed And I select a return flight and continue...................................passed Then I should see Passenger Details page....................................passed When I enter Last Name "Belgaumkar", First Name "Pooja", DOB "15/06/2002", Phone "9876543210", Email "pooja@testmail.com", National ID "A1234567".passed And I click continue on passenger page......................................passed And I skip add-ons and proceed to payment page..............................passed Then I should see Payment Page..............................................passed
